name: ONLY YOU CAN SEE THEM
description:
EVERYTHING AND EVERYONE IS ABOUT TO GET WEIRD

YOU started to see THEM.

YOU did not know what to do. THEY seemed to know more. YOU tried to talk. It failed. YOU tried to scream. But everyone just thought you were insane.

Then THEY started consuming.

You have to show everyone, save your friends, your familly, yes, even the dickheads from PTA.

I've had a weird night ok

I dreamed that the world was ending in nuclear fire and nobody seemed to care. That horror stayed with me, but, y'know, nuclear fire is just a bit too real, so i made a game about creepy cute horrors ending the world instead.

Sue me.

A surreal GMless GameWhere you try to convince made up people that they're about to get eaten

This game doesn't use magic, instead you use your brain to imagine what happens when some horrors from beyond the stars that seem to only bother you start causing trouble.

YOU and THEM collaborate to create a weird story of conspiracy and suspicion with a lil' help from random trials.

Play with 2-7 seven person of questionable honor and be nice to each other.

Created as an entry of the JAM FOR KNUTH

Certified 100% birdless (but you knew that, since birds aren't real)
